SEARCH
Module FoundationsF25_2
Package jUnitTesting

Class DataManageAndStorageTests

java.lang.Object
jUnitTesting.DataManageAndStorageTests
public class DataManageAndStorageTests extends Object
Test suite for validating database operations, including CRUD, search, and concurrent access.

Tests cover:

  • CRUD operations for Threads, Users, Posts, and Replies
  • Expiration handling for InvitationCodes and OneTimePasscodes
  • Search functionality for Posts
  • Invalid operations: NULL titles, invalid foreign keys, content too long, SQL injection attempts
  • High-load and concurrent read/write scenarios

This class assumes a test database is available and the Database helper class provides necessary methods for CRUD and query operations.

Version:
1.0

  • Method Details

    • setup

      @BeforeEach public void setup() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test method. Connects to the database, clears all tables, and creates default threads.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database connection or table setup fails

    • teardown

      @AfterEach public void teardown() throws Exception
      Cleans up the database after each test.
      Throws:
      Exception - if clearing the database fails

    • testUserCRUD

      @Test public void testUserCRUD() throws Exception
      Tests basic CRUD operations for Users. Verifies registration, existence check, listing, and deletion.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • testPostsAndRepliesCRUD

      @Test public void testPostsAndRepliesCRUD() throws Exception
      Tests CRUD operations for Posts and Replies. Validates creation, updates, linking replies, and deletion.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • testSearchPosts

      @Test public void testSearchPosts() throws Exception
      Tests search functionality for posts. Ensures exact, partial, and case-insensitive search behavior.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • testInsertNullTitle

      @Test public void testInsertNullTitle() throws Exception
      Tests inserting a post with a NULL title. Verifies that database constraints prevent insertion.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • testInsertInvalidForeignKey

      @Test public void testInsertInvalidForeignKey() throws Exception
      Tests inserting a post with an invalid foreign key (non-existent thread ID). Expects SQLException to be thrown.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • testUpdateContentTooLong

      @Test public void testUpdateContentTooLong() throws Exception
      Tests updating post content with a value exceeding 2200 characters. Expects SQLException to be thrown.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • testSearchSqlInjectionAttempt

      @Test public void testSearchSqlInjectionAttempt() throws Exception
      Tests SQL injection attempt via searchPostsByTitle. Ensures Posts table is not dropped or corrupted.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • testHighInsertLoadConcurrent1000

      @Test public void testHighInsertLoadConcurrent1000() throws Exception
      Inserts 1000 posts concurrently across multiple threads. Verifies that the majority succeed without deadlock.
      Throws:
      Exception - if concurrent database operations fail

    • testConcurrentReadWriteMixed

      @Test public void testConcurrentReadWriteMixed() throws Exception
      Tests concurrent mixed read/write access with 10 threads. Each thread randomly reads or writes posts multiple times.
      Throws:
      Exception - if concurrent operations fail

    • testExpiredInvitationCodesAreRemoved

      @Test public void testExpiredInvitationCodesAreRemoved() throws Exception
      Tests that expired invitation codes (older than 24 hours) are removed. Verifies that only valid, recent codes remain.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • testExpiredOneTimePasscodesAreRemoved

      @Test public void testExpiredOneTimePasscodesAreRemoved() throws Exception
      Tests that expired one-time passcodes (older than 24 hours) are removed. Verifies that only valid, recent OTPs remain.
      Throws:
      Exception - if database operations fail

    • obtainConnection

      private Connection obtainConnection() throws Exception
      Obtains the JDBC Connection from the Database helper using reflection.
      Returns:
      JDBC Connection
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection fails

    • randomSuffix

      private String randomSuffix()
      Generates a short random string for unique naming in tests.
      Returns:
      random 6-character string

    • threadsContains

      private boolean threadsContains(String threadName) throws SQLException
      Checks if the database contains a thread with the given name.
      Parameters:
      threadName - thread name to search for
      Returns:
      true if exists, false otherwise
      Throws:
      SQLException - if database query fails
